Name: Risk Area
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A place that identifies a geographical area as a single unit to which a same set of risk conditions apply. It describes the boundaries of the area that is considered as exposed to a same level of risk.  Identifies a place as it can be found on a risk place map.

Name: Standard Policy Deductible
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The total deductible applicable for a given coverage.

Name: Sum Insured Limit
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The highest limit of amount that the insurer can be obliged to pay out under the policy.

Name: Telephone Number
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The general-purpose telephone information that is needed to contact a wired or wireless telephone device.

Name: Year Electricity Upgraded
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Year when the building was last electrically wired or re-wired.
